languages.text: "Хотел{mf||а} бы я побывать в твоей вселенной. Она, кажется, добрее и светлее моей".
"I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."
languages.original_text: "Хотел{mf||а} бы я побывать в твоей вселенной. Она, кажется, добрее и светлее моей".

traits.locale_text: "I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."
"I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."
"I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."
"I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."
"I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."
"I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."

languages.text: « J'aimerais beaucoup visiter votre univers. Il a l'air plus agréable et plus paisible que le mien. »
languages.original_text: "I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais beaucoup visiter votre univers. Il a l'air plus agréable et plus paisible que le mien. »

languages.text: «Ojalá pudiera visitar tu universo. Parece más luminoso y amable que el mío».
languages.original_text: "I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá pudiera visitar tu universo. Parece más luminoso y amable que el mío».

languages.text: “如果能参观你的世界就好了，那个世界似乎比这边的世界更明亮、更善良。”
languages.original_text: "I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."

traits.locale_text: “如果能参观你的世界就好了，那个世界似乎比这边的世界更明亮、更善良。”

languages.text: 「お前の宇宙を訪れてみたいものだな。{mf|俺|私}のものよりも、明るく、優しそうだ」
languages.original_text: "I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の宇宙を訪れてみたいものだな。{mf|俺|私}のものよりも、明るく、優しそうだ」

languages.text: "Ich wünschte, ich könnte Euer Universum besuchen. Es scheint mir heller und freundlicher zu sein als das meine."
languages.original_text: "I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wünschte, ich könnte Euer Universum besuchen. Es scheint mir heller und freundlicher zu sein als das meine."

languages.text: "Keşke senin evrenini ziyaret edebilseydim. Benimkinden daha aydınlık ve kibar bir dünyaya benziyor."
languages.original_text: "I wish I could visit your universe. It seems to be brighter and kinder than mine."
